required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Assess Safety and Tolerability of AZD4547 in Japanese Patient
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Open-Label, Multicentre Study to Assess the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Preliminary Anti-tumour Activity of Ascending Doses of AZD4547 in Japanese Patients With Advanced Solid Malignancies

brief_summary.textblock: The primary purpose of this study is to explore the safety and tolerability of AZD4547 in Japanese patients with advanced solid malignancies.

detailed_description.textblock: A Phase I, Open-Label, Multicentre Study to Assess the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Preliminary Anti-tumour Activity of Ascending Doses of AZD4547 in Japanese Patients with Advanced Solid Malignancies.

secondary_outcome.measure: Define the maximum tolerated dose (MTD) if possible or biological effective dose.
To explore the pharmacokinetics (PK) of AZD4547and metabolite in Japanese patients with advanced solid malignancies when given AZD4547 orally.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Schedule of PK assessment 1. AZD4547; blood Cycle0-day1 -day21; 27 point 2. AZD4547 metabolite; blood Cycle1-day21; 1 poin 3. AZD4547; urine Cycle1-day21; 1 point

secondary_outcome.measure: To obtain a preliminary assessment of the anti-tumour effect of AZD4547 by evaluation of tumour response using Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumours (RECIST) criteria v1.1.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Schedule of CT/MRI etc-screeing-cycle1 day21-every 6 weeks-the end of treatment

intervention.description: film coated tablet, PO, twice daily

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Japanese patients with advanced solid malignancies Over 25 years old Relatively good overall health other than cancer
Exclusion Criteria:
- Poor bone marrow function (not producing enough blood cells). Poor liver or kidney function. Refractory nausea and vomiting, chronic gastrointestinal diseases, inability to swallow the IP or previous significant bowel resection.

overall_official.affiliation: National Hospital Organisation Nagoya Medical Centre
